bibl.title: The Correspondence between Abgar and Jesus. A Re-edition of a Bodleian Papyrus.
bibl.note: P. Bodl. Ms.Gr.theol. b. 1 (P) (= van Haelst 613, 1). - [Introduction.] - The letter as 'proof' of Edessan orthodoxy. - From proof to palladium. - From palladium to amulet. - Notes.

bibl.title: Land of Dreams. Greek and Latin Studies in Honour of A.H.M. Kessels

bibl.seg: SALOMONS Rob, The Correspondence between Abgar and Jesus. A Re-edition of a Bodleian Papyrus.
A.P.M.H. LARDINOIS, M.G.M. VAN DER POEL and V.J.C. HUNINK (Edd.), Land of Dreams. Greek and Latin Studies in Honour of A.H.M. Kessels (Leiden, 2006) pp. 299-310.
P. Bodl. Ms.Gr.theol. b. 1 (P) (= van Haelst 613, 1). - [Introduction.] - The letter as 'proof' of Edessan orthodoxy. - From proof to palladium. - From palladium to amulet. - Notes.
